params.leader: Address of the leader to copy

returns.vault: Address of the newly created vault

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createVault(address).notice: Create a new copy vault for a follower

getAllVaults().notice: Get all vaults in the system

getLeaderFollowerCount(address).notice: Get total follower count for a leader

getLeaderTvl(address,address).notice: Calculate total tvl for a leader across all follower vaults

getLeaderVaults(address).notice: Get all follower vaults for a specific leader

getVault(address,address).notice: Get vault address for a follower-leader pair

isVault(address).notice: Check if an address is a valid vault

setTerminal(address).notice: Set the Leader Terminal contract address
